Detailed Description

Implementation class of scissors.

vtkToolScissors is the class that implements the scissors tool, inside the scene. Contains methods for position control of the tool in the scene and collision detection. Scissors are composed of 3 pieces: 1 stick and 2 blades (vtkPiece) Inherits vtkToolLaparascopy
